meanings.definition: Laughing in a light, playful manner.
meanings.sent1: The children were giggling happily during recess.
meanings.sent2: She heard her friends giggling at the funny joke.
meanings.sent3: The puppy started giggling when tickled on its belly.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed to be giggling in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The giggling baby brought joy to everyone around.

meanings.definition: The act of laughing in a light, playful manner.
meanings.sent1: The giggling of the students filled the classroom with joy.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but join in the giggling at the comedy show.
meanings.sent3: The giggling of the kittens was music to her ears.
meanings.sent4: The giggling of the stream echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The giggling of the audience made the comedian smile.
